title: 50,000 Signed Letter Calling for AI Advancement Pause, Nonprofit Says

title: TikTok Suspected of Retaining Code That Can Switch to CCP Censorship Mode

title: ‘If We Go Ahead on This Everyone Will Die’ Warns AI Expert Calling for Absolute Shutdown
description: An AI robot titled "Alter 3: Offloaded Agency," is pictured during a photocall to promote the forthcoming exhibition entitled "AI: More than Human", at the Barbican Centre in London on May 15, 2019. (Ben Stansall/AFP via Getty Images)
